testcase.classname: US1021 homepage logo test on novodaily website
testcase.name: TC26 The user should be able to return to the homepage when clicking on the NOVODAILY logo
testcase.system-out: Given Go to the "ndUrl" NovoDaily website...................................passed Then wait for the homepage to load for 5 seconds............................passed And Click on the "NOVODAILY" font logo......................................passed And Verify that the NovoDaily logo is displayed on the homepage.............passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
